update.description:
* Now, the help interface for segway -h will be:

```
usage: segway [global_args] COMMAND [args]...

Segmentation and automated genome annotation.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --version             show program's version number and exit

list of commands:
  
train			Runs gmtkEMtrain on specified genomedata archive(s)
- train-init		Sets up directory structure and generates all gmtk input files
- train-run		Runs training to completion or to a specified number of iterations
-- train-run-round	Runs a single round of training
- train-finish		Selects best training instance and generates output master and params files

annotate		Runs gmtkViterbi on given archives and training directory, provides labels to entire genome
- annotate-init		Sets up directory structure and generates all gmtk input files
- annotate-run		Submits jobs to Viterbi
- annotate-finish	Compiles all viterbi output files together into a single bed file for all labels

posterior		Runs gmtkJT and produces prior probability of each label at each index
- posterior-init	Sets up directory structure and generates all gmtk input files
- posterior-run		Submits jonbs to JT
- posterior-finish	Compiles all output posterior files, and produces a bed file for each label

Use `segway COMMAND --help`, for help specific to each command.
```

While the segway annotate -h message will be:

```
usage:  segway annotate [args] GENOMEDATA TRAINDIR ANNOTATEDIR
```

```
positional arguments:
    archives
    traindir
    annotatedir

optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit
```
update.title: Fix help messages generated by segway -h and segway annotate -h

pull_request.title: Fix help messages generated by segway -h and segway annotate -h

update.description:
* Now, the help interface for segway -h will be:

    



```
usage: 

Segmentation and automated genome annotation. Please see: segway TASK -h, for
steps specific to each task

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --version             show program's version number and exit

Segway Commands:
  

    List of available tasks:

    train
    - train-init
    - train-run
    -- train-run-round
    - train-finish

    annotate
    - annotate-init
    - annotate-run
    - annotate-finish

    posterior
    - posterior-init
    - posterior-run
    - posterior-finish
```

While the segway annotate -h message will be:

```
usage:  annotate [-h] [-c] [--include-coords FILE] [--exclude-coords FILE][--output-label OUTPUT_LABEL] [--seg-table FILE] [-b FILE][--bigBed FILE]archives [archives ...] traindir annotatedir

positional arguments:
    archives
    traindir
    annotatedir

optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit
```

content.raw:
This comes from the description field of the ArgParser object. It remains unchanged from before and can be found in run.py lines from 3713-3715.

Will correct the spelling and update the Semi-automated part.
content.html:
This comes from the description field of the ArgParser object. It remains unchanged from before and can be found in run.py lines from 3713-3715.

Will correct the spelling and update the Semi-automated part.

pullrequest.title: Fix help messages generated by segway -h and segway annotate -h

content.raw:
Where does the text `Semi-automated genome annotation. Please see: segway TASK -h, for stepsspecific to each task`\` come form? I don’t see it in the source below? Check spelling. Can you please put in the output of \`segway -h\` now?

Please change the description from “Semi-automated genome annotation” to “Segmentation and automated genome annotation” per an upcoming paper by Libbrecht, Chan, and Hoffman.

Just use a single hyphen and spaces, no need to use vertical bars.
content.html:
Where does the text Semi-automated genome annotation. Please see: segway TASK -h, for stepsspecific to each task` come form? I don’t see it in the source below? Check spelling. Can you please put in the output of `segway -h` now?

Please change the description from “Semi-automated genome annotation” to “Segmentation and automated genome annotation” per an upcoming paper by Libbrecht, Chan, and Hoffman.

Just use a single hyphen and spaces, no need to use vertical bars.
